text.text: The Graal property, located in the Lac St-Jean region southeast of the Lac a Paul Arianne Phosphate deposit and 160 km north-northeast of the city of Saguenay, comprises 87 owned and 23 optioned claims covering 6,113 hectares.
An airborne geophysical survey in early 2021 identified Graal as the most geologically prospective in the region.
